title: The Globetrotter from Figurines: The Three-Dimensional Design of the Electro-Mechanical Show "Victory over the Sun" (Figurinen, die plastische Gestaltung der elektro-mechanischen Schau "Sieg über die Sonne")
medium: One from a portfolio of ten lithographs
dimensions: composition (irreg.): 14 3/16 x 10 1/4" (36 x 26 cm); sheet: 21 x 17 7/8" (53.3 x 45.4cm)
